userprofileform.body:
<form method="post" accept-charset="UTF-8">
	{{ getCsrfInput() }}
	<input type="hidden" name="action" value="users/saveUser">
	<input type="hidden" name="redirect" value="users/{{ currentUser.username }}">
	<input type="hidden" name="userId" value="{{ currentUser.id }}">

	<label for="location">Location</label>
	<input type="text" id="location" name="fields[location]" value="{{ currentUser.location }}">

	<label for="bio">Bio</label>
	<textarea id="bio" name="fields[bio]">{{ currentUser.bio }}</textarea>

	<input type="submit" value="Save Profile">
</form>

searchform.body:
<form action="{{ url('search/results') }}">
	<input type="search" name="q" placeholder="Search">
	<input type="submit" value="Go">
</form>

searchformr.body:
Search Results

{% set query = craft.request.getParam('q') %} {% set entries = craft.entries.search(query).order('score') %} {% if entries|length %}

{{ entries|length }} results:

    {% for entry in entries %}
  • {{ entry.title }}
    • {% endfor %}
{% else %}

Your search for “{{ query }}” didn’t return any results.

{% endif %}

rss.body:
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<rss version="2.0">
	<channel>
		<title>{{ siteName }}</title>
		<link>{{ siteUrl }}</link>
		<atom:link href="{{ craft.request.url }}" rel="self" type="application/rss+xml" />
		<description>{{ globals.siteDescription }}</description>
		<language>en-us</language>
		<pubDate>{{ now.rss }}</pubDate>
		<lastBuildDate>{{ now.rss }}</lastBuildDate>

		{% for entry in craft.entries.find() %}
			<item>
				<title>{{ entry.title }}</title>
				<link>{{ entry.url }}</link>
				<pubDate>{{ entry.postDate.rss }}</pubDate>
				<author>{{ entry.author }}</author>
				<guid>{{ entry.url }}</guid>
				<description><![CDATA[
					{{ entry.body }}
				]]></description>
			</item>
		{% endfor %}
	</channel>
</rss>
